name: Heggarna
description: Heggarna is a tiny, cat-disguised aberration with a slippery flesh beneath its illusory fur.
memorable: Heggarna instills nightmares while feeding on the Charisma of its sleeping prey.
goals: To undermine foes through deception and drain their Charisma.
relations: Often encountered in the company of other shadowy or deceptive creatures.
environment: Typically found lurking in shadows, often in urban or dark areas.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma enhance its stealth and manipulation abilities.
weaknesses: Physically weak with low Strength and poor defenses in direct confrontations.
attacks: A bite attack that deals piercing and psychic damage, instilling fear through its psychic abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Dream Eating allows it to sap the Charisma of sleeping targets, causing nightmares.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, helping it navigate in darkness.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, making it a skilled infiltrator.
additional_information: Ability to create magical illusions to resemble a harmless cat.
Can incapacitate enemies with its psychic energy.
Gains advantage on stealth checks while disguised.
Charisma drain can lead to the target's death.
Functions best in dim light or darkness.
test_queries: tiny psychic monster that disguises as a cat
shadow creature with dream feeding abilities
